name: Don't look back (itch) (Gamedev Demon)
description:
Don't look back is a game where you play as a person who is very sad and doesn't want to turn back and look at his previous life. 

This was inspired by the game Won't look back made by Serponge.

The game has 10 levels and you can speedrun it. If you speedrun it and be the fastest your name will be displayed on this page. Send video as proof.

Install instructions
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on your desktop
  • Right-click > Extract Here
  • Double click on the .exe file
  •  Enjoy
  • Linux and Mac IDK how to do.
